goal.ch:
• 建立學術寫作基礎能力
•學生能從主題發想到段落撰寫，逐步發展成完整的文章，熟悉學術寫作的基本結構與規範（如引用與改述技巧）。
• 熟悉多種文章類型的寫作技巧
•掌握不同文體的寫作方法，包括議論文、過程文、因果文、比較對照文等，並能靈活應用於實際寫作中。
• 發展批判性思考與論證能力
•能撰寫具邏輯性與說服力的論點，整合反論點與駁論，增強論述的全面性與說服力。
• 提升自主學習與反思能力
•能夠對自己的寫作進行反思，識別並改進文章中的不足，並學會運用知識建構（Knowledge Building）平台進行協作學習。
• 強化文章的統一性與連貫性
•學生能有效組織文章內容，保證段落間的連貫性，並保持論述的統一性與邏輯性。
• 應用學術寫作於實際情境
•學生能針對不同題目撰寫學術文章，並透過小組報告與課堂討論深化對文章主題的理解與表達能力。
goal.en:
• Develop foundational academic writing skills
•Students will learn to progress from topic generation to paragraph writing and eventually to complete essays, mastering basic structures and conventions of academic writing, such as citation and paraphrasing techniques.
• Familiarize with various essay genres
•Students will acquire writing techniques for different genres, including argumentative essays, process essays, cause-and-effect essays, and comparison-and-contrast essays, and apply them effectively in their writing.
• Enhance critical thinking and argumentation skills
•Students will learn to write logical and persuasive arguments, integrate counterarguments and rebuttals, and strengthen the comprehensiveness and persuasiveness of their essays.
•  Foster self-directed learning and reflective abilities
•Students will reflect on their own writing, identify areas for improvement, and utilize the Knowledge Building (KB) platform for collaborative learning.
• Strengthen unity and coherence in essay writing
•Students will organize essay content effectively, ensure coherence between paragraphs, and maintain the unity and logical flow of their arguments.
• Apply academic writing in practical contexts
•Students will write academic essays on various topics and deepen their understanding and expression of essay themes through group reports and class discussions.
